A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Identity politics and social justice arrive in the galaxy far far away. 
I don't hate this movie just because the political agenda is corrupt and evil. I hate this movie because it's a terrible film.
Horrible script\, painful pacing\, terrible characters\, inconsequential subplots\, wretched cringe-worthy humor\, and disrespectful treatment of beloved established characters.
Now\, I could potentially forgive all of that if it were not for one final element; this movie is boring. By the end of the film I felt as if I had sat through a marathon of the worst highschool classes imaginable. 

For those of you who have seen the film\, you will understand: Rabbit-horse race\, and space Leia.

Save your time and money. Skip this one.
